structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Record Of Board Proceedings; Roster Of Licensees And Provisional Licensees
law.text: The board shall adopt reasonable rules and regulations to carry into effect sections 212 to 219, inclusive, and may amend and revoke such rules and regulations at its discretion. The board shall keep a record of its proceedings and a roster of all persons licensed or provisionally licensed by it under sections 213 to 219, inclusive. The roster shall include the licensee name, last known business and residential address, date of licensing and license number.
